name: Sacrifice (itch) (Log cat)
description:
I'm 13, French and I made this Game for the Ludum Dare 43...

I'm 13, French and I made this Game for the Ludum Dare 43...

Here is the Story :

You are a Journalist.
During a research in a little village, you discovered a Sect that is killing people for their god !

They are going to take you and sacrifice you because they think they saw you looking at them during a sacrifice !

Take your gun and shoot them all because they are going to try to kill you...

(Warning, this game is full of blood and dead people ! If you don't like this, don't play !)
